name: Black Box Alpha
detailed_description:
Black Box Alpha is a multiplayer first person shooter with horror elements. Set in a near future hyper reality, where arms dealers sell weapons to robots employed by political groups, who engineer them to fight each other over territory and influence by proxy. Now a new threat is emerging, a horde of older generation machines are rising up under the command of an ethereal force claiming to be the first rogue sentient AI, intent on freeing the synthetic race from control of the humans. Advanced weapons have been outlawed and are hard to get for the Robot mercenaries, who mostly rely on old stockpiles of modern human weapons uncovered by traders.

Control a Robot Fighter in the city of Vonga, the heart of robotic recycling. Fight off other teams of players controlling proxy mercenaries and endure waves of onslaught as the Rogue Bots and Civil Defense Force attempt to take you all down.

Multiplayer Free-For-All, Coop and Team Deathmatch modes featuring AI enemies.

  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
